item.title: Catholics Pray for Ailing Pope Francis at Sunday Mass
item.description: The 88-year-old pontiff has been hospitalized for more than a week and was given oxygen and a blood transfusion on Saturday.

item.title: Macron and Starmer Have Played Trump’s Game Before, but the Rules Are Changing
item.description: The leaders of France and Britain are both due to meet with President Trump this week. Approaches previously tried with him may no longer work.
